name: Seascraper
description:
You are 2 treasure-hunting divers, exploring an underwater building that used to be a skyscraper, now drowned by the tides...

Work together to find all six treasures!

Download instructions

Download and unzip folder. Run "Build" within same folder as other files.

Play instructions

Player 1 + Player 2
Keyboard: WASD (for movement) and E (for interaction) 
Controller: Left analog (movement), A/X (interaction)

Player 2 MUST USE CONTROLLER

Player 1 (red) stays on the top floor and provides player 2 (yellow) with oxygen and electricity and controls the rail.

Player 2  dives further down to find the lost treasures. Beware of what hides in the dark!

___________________________________________________________________

Game made at Kaktus Jam 2018 by

Christian Larsson, Christian Weatherley, Erik Andersen, Francesco Sedda & Jordy van Opstal
